ygData.subject: Re: Equipment
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow, looks like I need to go shopping! I ll post this, perhaps somewhere some level 1 bard will think I m the man hehe! Head: Bronze Helm Face: Leering Mask
ygData.messageBody:
Wow, looks like I need to go shopping!

I'll post this, perhaps somewhere some level 1 bard will think I'm the man
hehe!

Head: Bronze Helm
Face: Leering Mask
Ears: Golden Amber Earrings X2
Neck: Spiked Collar
Shoulders: Bloodstained Mantle
Arms: Bronze Vambraces
Wrist 1: Bracer of Erollisi
Wrist 2: Bronze Bracer
Hands: Lambent Gauntlets (I still keep my elf-hide in reserve though)
Rings: Jagged Band, Can't remember the other, some wedding band or something
+2 STR maybe?
Back: Banded Cloak (Hehe)
Waist: Drakescale Belt
Legs: Lambent Greaves
Feet: Kobold Hide Boots

Weapons: Obsidian Scimitar X2, Dragoon Dirk, and my newly dusted off
Obsidian Shard - thanks for the info by the way, who knew? A fire proc
resisted by fire goblins? Sometimes I truly think I'm the slowest bard in
Norrath.

Instruments: Hand drum, lute, wodden flute, brass horn. I live dangerously!

Money? Not a clue, not very much anymore after buying my lambent jewels.

So there, I'll have you all know that I think the half smurf-half carrot
look is going to be very in this season! At least you guys give us all
something of a wish list to shoot for!

Weiland
<Disciples of Truth>
Erollisi Marr

Elwyn - If you feel inclined, throw your list up here. I'm curious, but
still too timid in game to ask to inspect hehe. See you round!


----- Original Message -----
From: "Ryan Honeyman" <honeyman@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, December 06, 1999 10:38 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Equipment


> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
>
> Full Lambent Armor.
> Electrum Sapphire Earring x2
> Plat Star Ruby Veil
> Golden Black Pearl Choker
> Golden Star Ruby Ring x2
> Cloak of Shadows
> Drakescale Belt
> Carnal Pauldrons
> Short Sword of the Ykesha x2
> Dragoon Dirk (ranged)
> Throwing Daggers (ammo, left on body for corpse revive usually)
>
> MM Battle Drums
> Lute of the Gypsy Princess
> Gypsy Lute
> Mino Horn (I would upgrade, but no songs for wind bonuses ;p)
> Brass Horn
>
> ..and worthless money, heh. don't know how much i have.
>
> Just need levels and Plane armor now.
>
> oh yeah, Operaman, I would like Brahm's Horn too. Add that to the list.
> hehe.
>
> Harmonic.
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
